remarks: Value of projectivity from vector space H to dual space.  TODO: 1.  This is shorter than others - make it the official def?  (but is not as obvious that it is ` C_ C ` ) 2.  The unneeded direction of ~ lcfl8a has awkward ` E. ` - add another thm with only one direction of it? 3.  Swap ` O `` { v } ` and ` L `` f ` ?  (Contributed by NM, 31-Jan-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mapdval4.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdval4.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdval4.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
mapdval4.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
mapdval4.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
mapdval4.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdval4.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdval4.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdval4.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. S ) $.
mapdval4N $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` T ) = { f e. F | E. v e. T ( O ` { v } ) = ( L ` f ) } ) $.
$d F f v $.
$d K f $.
$d L v $.
$d O v $.
$d T f v $.
$d U v $.
$d W f $.
$d f ph v $.
